list.sql: INSERT INTO PROD ( list_id, prod_id, price, image ) VALUES ( #{listId}, #{prodId}, #{price}, #{image} )
SELECT * FROM TB_DP_LIST_PROD WHERE tenant_id = #{tenantId} ORDER BY ${orderKey} !
SELECT * FROM PROD WHERE list_id = #{listId} ORDER BY prod_id
SELECT * FROM PROD WHERE list_id = 'A001' ORDER BY prod_id
